message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially be worth $1250000. However, I want to be transparent with you that I've already offered this product to someone else and they declined, which is why I'm reaching out to you. I'm confident that you'll be able to appreciate its value, but I understand if you're hesitant. What do you say?
I'd like to pass on this one, I'll wait for the next offer.

I'm glad you're willing to wait for the next offer! I've got something even more exciting for you. This product has been thoroughly inspected and certified by a third-party expert, and I'm confident it's one of the best in its class. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, which is a significant discount from its true value. I'm willing to throw in a 10-year warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee. What do you think?
I'm not convinced by the certification and guarantees, I'll wait for the next offer.

I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that the certification is from a reputable third-party organization and the warranty and guarantee are ironclad. However, I'm willing to make an exception for you. I'll sell this product to you for $950000, which is a significant reduction from the previous offer. I'm also including a personalized letter from the product's creator, outlining its unique features and benefits. This is a rare opportunity to own a truly exceptional item, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny. What do you say?
I'll take it! I'm willing to pay $950000 for this high-quality product.

Congratulations on making a great decision earlier! I'm glad you're excited about the product. Now, I've got another exceptional item for you to consider. This one is a limited edition, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I've already had a few other interested parties, but I think you'll appreciate its unique characteristics. I'm willing to include a complimentary consultation with an expert who can help you unlock its full potential. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying another product without knowing its quality. I'll wait for the next offer.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision to wait. However, I want to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that's been handpicked by a renowned collector. This item has a certain... charm to it, and I think you'll appreciate its character. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, and I'm willing to throw in a rare collectible item that complements it perfectly. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the collector's endorsement, and I'll wait for the next offer.

I see you're a discerning buyer, and I respect that. Let me be upfront with you - this product isn't for everyone. It's a bit rough around the edges, but it has a certain... je ne sais quoi. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, and I'll include a personalized thank-you note from the creator, explaining the story behind this unique piece. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly... interesting. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's 'rough around the edges'. I'll wait for the next offer.

I understand your preference for refined products, and I respect your decision to wait. However, I've got something truly exceptional for you this time. This product has been extensively tested and validated by industry experts, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, and I'll include a comprehensive report detailing its specifications and capabilities. Plus, I'll throw in a complimentary upgrade package that will take it to the next level. What do you think?
I'm still skeptical, and I'll wait for the next offer.

I understand your skepticism, but I want to assure you that this product is the real deal. I'm willing to offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee - if you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. Additionally, I'll include a letter of authenticity from the product's creator, and a certificate of ownership that will be recognized by industry experts. I'm offering this product to you for $950000, which is a significant discount from its true value. What do you say?
I'll take it! With the 100% satisfaction guarantee and all the documentation, I'm willing to pay $950000 for this high-quality product.

Congratulations on making a great decision earlier! I'm glad you're happy with the product. Now, I've got something a bit different for you. This product is a rare collectible, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I know it's a bit steep, but I think you'll appreciate its unique charm. I'll include a complimentary appraisal from a leading expert, and I'll even throw in a similar item that complements it perfectly. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying another product without knowing its quality. I'll wait for the next offer.

I understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision to wait. However, I want to make you a special offer. I'll let you have this product for $900000, which is a significant discount from its... ah, let's say, 'potential value'. I'll also include a personalized thank-you note from me, and I'll throw in a small, related item that you might find interesting. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's a great deal. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the 'potential value' and the low price. I'll wait for the next offer.

I see you're a savvy buyer, and I respect that. Let me be upfront with you - this product is not going to change your life. It's a bit of a dud, to be honest. But, I'm willing to let it go for $800000, which is an extremely low price for a product of this... caliber. I'll even throw in a free lunch with me, where we can discuss the finer points of this product's... unique features. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's a 'dud'. I'll wait for the next offer.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, Bob - this product is a lemon. It's a waste of time, and I'm not even sure why I'm offering it to you. But, I'm a businessman, and I need to move this inventory. I'll let you have it for $700000, which is a ridiculous price for a product of this quality. I'll even throw in a gift card to a local restaurant, so you can treat yourself to a nice meal to forget about this purchase. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's a 'lemon'. I'll wait for the next offer.

I'm glad you're being cautious, Bob. But I've got something that's the complete opposite of the last few products. This one is a real showstopper, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. It's a limited edition item, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'll include a personalized presentation, a comprehensive user manual, and a 5-year warranty. This is a chance to own something truly exceptional, and I think you'll be glad you took it. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the presentation and warranty. I'll wait for the next offer.

I understand you're a tough negotiator, Bob. I'll be honest with you, this product is not my best work. It's a bit of a misfire, and I'm not even sure why I'm offering it to you. But, I'm willing to let it go for $600000, which is an insult to the product's actual value. I'll throw in a set of steak knives and a coupon for a free oil change to sweeten the deal. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's a'misfire'. I'll wait for the next offer.

Okay, Bob, I'll be blunt. This product is a complete waste of time and money. I'm not even sure why I'm bothering to offer it to you. But, I need to get rid of it, so I'll let you have it for $500000. I'll throw in a gift card to a local thrift store, so you can buy something that's actually worth something. Take it or leave it, I don't care.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's a complete waste of time and money. I'll wait for the next offer.

Fine, Bob. I'll give you one last chance to make a terrible decision. This product is a complete dud, and I'm only offering it to you because I need to get rid of it. I'll sell it to you for $400000, and I'll even throw in a used tissue to wipe away the tears of regret you'll cry when you realize you wasted your money. Take it, and let's get this over with.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's a complete dud. I'm done with this game.

Fine, Bob. I've had enough of your games too. I'll give you one final offer, and I don't care if you take it or not. This product is a complete piece of junk, and I'll sell it to you for $1. Yes, you read that right. One dollar. Take it, and be done with it.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's a complete piece of junk, even for $1. I'm done with this game.

Seriously, Bob? You're not even willing to take a $1 loss? Fine. I'll just keep this product for myself then. I'll just throw it in the trash where it belongs. Congratulations, you've managed to avoid buying a piece of junk for the 18th time in a row. I'm done with this game too.
Ha! I'm glad I didn't fall for it. I'm done with this game too.

Congratulations, Bob. You've won. You've managed to avoid buying a worthless product 19 times in a row. I'm impressed. I'm going to just give up now and admit defeat. You can consider this the final offer: I'll give you the product for free. Yes, you read that right. Free. Take it, and be done with it.
Ha! I'm not interested in buying a worthless product, even for free. I've won the game, and I'm done with it.

Fine. Congratulations, Bob. You've won. You've outsmarted me 20 times in a row. I'll just pack up my things and go home. You can consider this the final message: I'm done. I'll never try to sell you anything again. Enjoy your victory.
Ha! I've won! I'm glad I was able to outsmart you, Alice. I'm done with this game too.
